original: NORRBY, Oscar Bertil, Bankkamrer, Skän-ninge, f Lidkp 31/1 07 av Salomon Norrby o Elin Andersson, gm Britt Levander. Studex Gbg 26, Gbg hdlsinst 26—27. Anst Mjölby-Hästholmens jvg 25 o 26, Mjby kvarnAB 28, Inteckn.bkn Sthlm 28—42. Göstrings hds o Skeninge stads sparbk sed. 42. Styr.led o kassaförv S:ta Ingrids Gille, styr.suppl Ögl sparbkfrn, rev Ellen Keys stift Strands viloh, Alvastra, ortsombud f RFA samt Skandia o Freja. Lär i bokför v Skänn stads yrkesskolor. Medl ordenssällsk TT. Hobbies: Promenader, cykling. °NORRE, Harald Emanuel, överingenjör, Munksund, f Junsele, Vnorrl l, 29/3 92 av kronolänsman E Olson o Hilda Nilsson, gm Hildegard Lundberg. Studex i Hsand 11, CTI (kemi) 12—15. Driftsing f sulfatfabr v Iggesunds Cellulosafabriker 15—18, driftsbestyrer v AS Fladeby Cellulosefabrik i Norge 18—27, övering v Obbola Sulfatfabr 27—30, ch.ing v Munksunds AB sed. 20. Led Sv Tekn.frn. °NORRMAN, Karl Adolf Åke, Ingenjör, Saltsjöbaden, f Gbg- 10/8 89 av dir E D N o Maria Hummel, gm (1) Lithi Lindholm (d), (2) Anne-Marie Tägtmeijer. Mog.ex NReal Sthlm 07, KTH (maskinbyggn o mek tekn) 08—12. Prakt i USA 13—14, anst å AB de Lavals rit-kont o offertavd bl a i Ryssl 14—18, anst v AB Fläktar & Pumpar Sthlm 18—19, deläg i fman Norrman & Fröström 19, eg konsult verksamhet i Sthlm sed. 20 (spec förvärderingar o brandskadev^rderingar).
translated:
NORRBY, Oscar Bertil, Bank Clerk, Skänninge, born in Lidköping on January 31, 1907 to Salomon Norrby and Elin Andersson, married to Britt Levander. Completed studies in Gothenburg in 1926, and Gothenburg Commerce Institute in 1926-1927. Employed at Mjölby-Hästholmen Railway in 1925 and 1926, Mjölby Mill AB in 1928, Mortgage Bank in Stockholm from 1928 to 1942. Board member and treasurer of S:ta Ingrids Guild, substitute board member of Ögl Savings Bank, auditor for Ellen Key's Strand Rest Foundation in Alvastra, local representative for RFA (unknown organization), as well as for Skandia and Freja. Teacher of bookkeeping at Skänninge Vocational Schools. Member of the Order Society TT. Hobbies: Walks, cycling.

NORRE, Harald Emanuel, Chief Engineer, Munksund, born in Junsele, Northern Sweden, on March 29, 1892, to county sheriff E Olson and Hilda Nilsson, married to Hildegard Lundberg. Completed studies in Härnösand in 1911, and CTI (Chemical Technology Institute) from 1912 to 1915. Worked as a plant engineer at Iggesund Cellulose Factory from 1915 to 1918, plant manager at AS Fladeby Cellulose Factory in Norway from 1918 to 1927, chief engineer at Obbola Sulfate Factory from 1927 to 1930, and chief engineer at Munksunds AB since 1920. Member of the Swedish Technical Association.

NORRMAN, Karl Adolf Åke, Engineer, Saltsjöbaden, born in Gothenburg on August 10, 1889, to director E D N and Maria Hummel, married (1) to Lithi Lindholm (deceased) and (2) to Anne-Marie Tägtmeijer. Passed the examination of Nautical Real School in Stockholm in 1907, studied Mechanical Engineering at KTH from 1908 to 1912. Practical experience in the USA from 1913 to 1914, employed at AB de Lavals' design department and quotation department, including in Russia, from 1914 to 1918, employed at AB Fläktar & Pumpar in Stockholm from 1918 to 1919, co-owner of the firm Norrman & Fröström since 1919, self-employed consultant in Stockholm since 1920, specializing in appraisals and fire damage assessments.
